doc.description: AHRS using complementary filter in fixed point. Propagation is done in quaternion representation.

configure.name: USE_MAGNETOMETER
configure.description: set to FALSE to disable magnetometer

configure.name: AHRS_ALIGNER_LED
configure.description: LED number to indicate AHRS alignment, none to disable (default is board dependent)

makefile.raw: ifdef SECONDARY_AHRS ifneq (,$(findstring $(SECONDARY_AHRS), icq int_cmpl_quat)) # this is the secondary AHRS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_SECONDARY_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/ahrs/ahrs_int_cmpl_quat_wrapper.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DSECONDARY_AHRS=ahrs_icq else # this is the primary AHRS $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/ahrs/ahrs_int_cmpl_quat_wrapper.h\" $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DPRIMARY_AHRS=ahrs_icq endif else # plain old single AHRS usage $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DAHRS_TYPE_H=\"subsystems/ahrs/ahrs_int_cmpl_quat_wrapper.h\" endif
